Hi Hagop,

 

How are you? 

 

For the proposed studio set up we would have a room that has Photography equipment and also stocks for shoot. Would this be insured if we had a break in or flooding etc?

 

We had a studio previously in DIP in 2023 and we used to lock the office every evening, so it was secure but just checking if additional insurance would be needed?

 

 

Thanks

Tamara
